--- title: "Graphic Design with ggplot2" subtitle: "Concepts of the {ggplot2} Package Pt. 1:
Solution Exercise 1" author: "Cédric Scherer **//** rstudio::conf **//** July 2022" format: revealjs: theme: css/style.scss footer: '**[Cédric Scherer](https::/cedricscherer.com) //** rstudio::conf **//** July 2022' #'rstudio::conf(workshop = "Graphic Design with ggplot2", instructor = "Cédric Scherer")' transition: fade progress: true multiplex: false preview-links: true scrollable: false hide-inactive-cursor: true highlight-style: printing chalkboard: theme: whiteboard boardmarker-width: 4 buttons: true pause: true mainfont: Cabinet Grotesk editor: source knitr: opts_chunk: dev: "ragg_png" retina: 1 dpi: 200 execute: freeze: auto cache: true echo: true fig-width: 5 fig-height: 6 --- ## Exercise 1 ::: question - Explore the TfL bike share data visually:
**create a timeseries of reported bike shares on weekend days** - Highlight day and night encoded by colors and shapes. - Connect the points of each period with lines. - What is the difference between `geom_line()` and `geom_path()`? - Apply your favorite theme to the plot. - Add meaningful labels. - [Bonus: use shape to encode Saturday vs Sunday instead.]{style="color:#5DB699;"} - Save the plot as a vector graphic with a decent plot size. ::: ## Import the Data Set ::: {.cell hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/import-data-exercise_da24f586c9e08b0c6f11359e0b79fcc3'} ```{.r .cell-code} bikes <- readr::read_csv( here::here("data", "london-bikes-custom.csv"), col_types = "Dcfffilllddddc" ) bikes$season <- forcats::fct_inorder(bikes$season) library(tidyverse) ``` ::: ## Scatterplot Counts vs. Date ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-1_d35c116a80a4c4410d9400bf9f695b18'} ```{.r .cell-code} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_point() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-1-1.png){width=1000} ::: ::: ## Encode Day Period by Colors and Shapes ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-2_4d773b0fd81483c48be63ea89db62501'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="6,7"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_point( aes(color = day_night, shape = day_night) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-2-1.png){width=1000} ::: ::: ## Add Line ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-3_240952ab7372b32e5003e12a87dd315e'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="9,10,11"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_point( aes(color = day_night, shape = day_night) ) + geom_line( color = "grey" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-3-1.png){width=1000} ::: ::: ## Group Lines by Day Period ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-4_7456e4dc85c9799df7d5c0886b8e4c9f'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="10"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_point( aes(color = day_night, shape = day_night) ) + geom_line( aes(group = day_night), color = "grey" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-4-1.png){width=1000} ::: ::: ## Order Layers ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-5_a047effafaafa8cff46be297cf8c5858'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="5,6,7,8"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_line( aes(group = day_night), color = "grey" ) + geom_point( aes(color = day_night, shape = day_night) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-5-1.png){width=1000} ::: ::: ## Use \`geom_path()\` instead ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-6_ce69236a72cb773eb80d59ef51aeee9b'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="5"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_path( aes(group = day_night), color = "grey" ) + geom_point( aes(color = day_night, shape = day_night) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-6-1.png){width=1000} ::: ::: ## \`geom_line()\` vs. \`geom_path()\` ::: {layout-ncol="2"} ::: {.cell hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-comp-path_c98a6979d9b5fe1d57a8a5392b255d70'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="3|5,6,7"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = temp_feel, y = count) ) + geom_path( aes(color = day_night) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-comp-path-1.png){width=1000} ::: ::: ::: fragment ::: {.cell hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-comp-line_76652e2a4b6b348d619d375fd6618c59'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="5,6,7"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = temp_feel, y = count) ) + geom_line( aes(color = day_night) ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-comp-line-1.png){width=1000} ::: ::: ::: ::: ## Apply a Theme ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-8_269311bc15b2e160a3c39feb56ad7136'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="1|1,14|14,15,16,17,18,19,20,21|15,16,17,18|19,20,21"} g <- ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_line( aes(group = day_night), color = "grey" ) + geom_point( aes(color = day_night, shape = day_night) ) g + theme_minimal( base_size = 15, base_family = "Lora" ) + theme( legend.position = "top", panel.grid.minor = element_blank() ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-8-1.png){width=1000} ::: ::: ## Add Meaningful Labels ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-9_0b1c736801922e504dfef64123882567'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="2,3,4,5,6,7"} g + labs( x = "Weekend date", y = "Reported bike shares", color = "Part of the Day:" ) + theme_minimal( base_size = 15, base_family = "Lora" ) + theme( legend.position = "top", panel.grid.minor = element_blank() ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-9-1.png){width=1000} ::: ::: ## Add Meaningful Labels ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-10_a8f93e74a80d4a658a48eaf1532b2a13'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="6"} g + labs( x = "Weekend date", y = "Reported bike shares", color = "Part of the Day:", shape = "Part of the Day:" ) + theme_minimal( base_size = 15, base_family = "Lora" ) + theme( legend.position = "top", panel.grid.minor = element_blank() ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-10-1.png){width=1000} ::: ::: ## Add Meaningful Labels ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-11_68d790b92d041343c0e773fd76e20def'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="5,6"} g + labs( x = "Weekend date", y = "Reported bike shares", color = NULL, shape = NULL ) + theme_minimal( base_size = 15, base_family = "Lora" ) + theme( legend.position = "top", panel.grid.minor = element_blank() ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-11-1.png){width=1000} ::: ::: ## Save the Plot ::: {.cell hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-12_0aff7679c33fd99386776b05dcb4cb5a'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="1,2|1|2"} ggsave(here::here("exercises", "plots", "02_concepts_pt1_ex1.pdf"), width = 9, height = 5, device = cairo_pdf) ``` ::: ![](plots/02_concepts_pt1_ex1.png){fig-align="center" fig-alt="The final plot with an aspect ratio of 9 x 5 inches while using a base_size of 15."} ::: footer ::: ## Bonus: Use Shape to Encode Sat vs Sun ::: {.cell output-location='column' hash='02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_cache/revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-bonus_8c4dff159cce8a64a8e85f2da84c051f'} ```{.r .cell-code code-line-numbers="11"} ggplot( filter(bikes, is_weekend == TRUE), aes(x = date, y = count) ) + geom_line( aes(group = day_night), color = "grey" ) + geom_point( aes(color = day_night, shape = lubridate::day(date) == 6) ) + labs( x = "Weekend date", y = "Reported bike shares", color = NULL, shape = NULL ) + theme_minimal( base_size = 15, base_family = "Lora" ) + theme( legend.position = "top", panel.grid.minor = element_blank() ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](02_concepts_pt1_ex1_solution_files/figure-revealjs/concepts-pt1-exercise-1-bonus-1.png){width=1000} ::: ::: ## <script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {

      // dispatch for htmlwidgets
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for reveal
    if (window.Reveal) {
      window.Reveal.addEventListener("slidechanged", function(event) {
        fireSlideChanged(event.previousSlide, event.currentSlide);
      });
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
